verses.name: Jeremiah 33:5
verses.text: They come to fight with the Chaldeans, but it is to fill them with the dead bodies of men, whom I have slain in mine anger and in my fury, and for all whose wickedness I have hid my face from this city.

verses.name: Jeremiah 33:6
verses.text: Behold, I will bring it health and cure, and I will cure them, and will reveal unto them the abundance of peace and truth.

verses.name: Jeremiah 33:7
verses.text: And I will cause the captivity of Judah and the captivity of Israel to return, and will build them, as at the first.
